text.value: What is the name of the main respondent
What is the relationship of the main respondent to the deceased child
Specify the relationship of the main respondent to the deceased child
Specify the source of date of birth
On the way to a facility
Specify the name of the hospital or health facility
Specify the address of the hospital or health facility
How many months was the mother pregnant with the child
How many babies were born of this pregnancy
Did the child's mother receive any tetanus vaccination since reaching adulthood before this pregnancy
How many doses of tetanus vaccination did the mother receive
Did the mother have any tetanol injections during the pregnancy
How many doses of tetanol injections did the mother receive
How is the mother's health now
On the way to hospital or health facility
Specify where the child was born
Specify who assisted in the delivery
Did the mother have a difficult labour
Did the child cry when s/he was born
What was used to cut the umbilical cord
Specify what was used to cut the umbilical cord
What was applied to the cord as dressing
Specify the dressing applied to the cord
How many days old was the child when s/he became ill
How many days old was the child when s/he died
How is the father's health now
Could you tell me about the illness that led to the baby's death
After a period of good health
What was the length of time of the illness immediately preceding the child's death
Was care sought outside the home while s/he had this illness
How many days after the illness started was care sought
Was care sought from a traditional healer
Was care sought from a religious leader
Was care sought from a hospital
Was care sought from a health center/clinic
Was care sought from a community-based practitioner (CHO, YZ)
Was care sought from a private physician or nurse
Was care sought from a pharmacy
Was care sought from a drug seller, store, or marker
Was care sought from relatives or friends
Was care sought from another source
Specify the source in which care was sought
What or from whom was care sought first
What or from whom was care sought second
What or from whom was care sought third
Did s/he die from an injury or accident
What kind of injury or accident
Specify the kind of animal bite
Did s/he die at the site where the accident or injury occurred
For how long after the accident or injury did s/he survive
Did the child receive medical care from the accident before death
Did the child have malformation at birth
At the time of the birth was the child
Were there any bruises or signs of injury on the child's body after the birth
Did the child have difficulties in breathing soon after birth
Did the child have difficulties in breathing after a period of wellbeing
Did the child have difficulties in feeding (sucking) soon after birth
Specify how long the child had difficulties feeding
Did the child have difficulties crying after a period of good health
During the illness that led to death did s/he have spasms or convulsions
During the illness that led to death did s/he become unresponsive or unconscious
During the illness that led to death did s/he have bulging fontanel
During the illness that led to death did s/he have yellow eyes or skin
During the illness that led to death did s/he have redness around, or drainage from, the umbilical cord stump
During the illness that led to death did s/he have areas of skin that were red, hot or peeling
During the illness that led to death did s/he have skin rash with blisters containing pus
During the illness that led to death did s/he have fever
How many days did s/he have fever
Was the fever throughout the period of the illness
During the illness that led to death, did the child's body feel cold when touched
During the illness that led to death, did s/he bleed from any part of the body
During the illness that led to death, did s/he have any vomiting or swelling of the abdomen
During the illness that led to death, did s/he have diarrhoea
For how many days were the stools more frequent or liquid
On the day when diarrhoea is most frequent, how many times did s/he pass stools each day
Was there visible blood in the stools
During the diarrhoea episode, was the child given any fluids such as ORS
During the illness that led to death, did s/he have any difficulty with breathing
How many days did the difficulty with breathing last
During the illness that led to death, did s/he have fast breathing
How many days did the fast breathing last
During the illness that led to death, did s/he have in drawing of the chest
During the illness that led to death, did s/he have a cough
How many days did the cough last
During the illness that led to death, did s/he have short periods of stopping and re-starting breathing

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Permanent Id is not the right format
House Id is not the right format
Field Worker Id is not the right format
The date of the interview cannot be in the future
The date of birth of child must be before interview date
The date of death must be between the date of birth and interview date
The year of birth of mother must be between 1960 and 2002
The number of months of pregnancy must be between 0 and 9
Babies born should be less than 6
The child must be between 0 and 27 days old
Should be less than 28, and greater than or equal to number of days ill
Length of time should be between 0 and 27

input.label: Specify other type of animal bite
